projects.title: Ecommerce Dashboard
projects.description: An ecommerce dashboard project that aims to make the functionalities of Excel portable on a mobile device. Built with Next.js frontend, MongoDB backend, and integrated Google Authentication system for secure user access.

projects.title: CrunchyRoll Award Data Analysis
projects.description: Collected, cleaned, and wrangled multiple data frames. Analyzed relationships between factors (total views, genre, manga sales). Created a predictive model with data visualization.
